title: Spelling in wrong language version
content:
I own a PIxel 3. Android 10
All of a sudden, after installing the latest version of Gboard ( 9.0.10.29.3644837) when I voice type, the spelling is English UK, instead of English US, which I set up originally.
Any ideas as to why ??
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
